Description: EVH Wolfgang Special Tobacco Sunburst6-string Electric Guitar I Purchased this guitar used a few years ago. I only played it a few times.Great Guitar. Only selling it to pay bills.I did not get a case when I purchased it but will included a used gig bag in fair condition and the trembar. I had it setup and new strings installed by a great guitar shop here in town for this sale so it is ready to play. Guitar show very little fret ware so looks to not have been played much. Could not find and real scratches or dings. Guitar is in Excellent condition. Below are details that relate to this guitar. Guitar was made in Mexico in 2014. Due to wood restriction no international sales on this item. Guitar will be shipped with full sale price insurance and require the new owners signature when delivered to insure safe delivery. Guitar will be securely packed for shipping.Thanks For Looking.Product Details:A beautiful new Wolfgang Special model with an arched top basswood body, crafted in EVH's Mexico facility with a re-imagined design that delivers more guitar at greater value than ever. Features include a quartersawn maple neck with an oil finish and special Wolfgang profile, smooth and fast compound-radius maple fingerboard (12"-16") with comfortably rolled edges and 22 jumbo frets, dual EVH Wolfgang direct-mount humbucking pickups, two domed black control knobs (master volume, master tone), EVH Floyd Rose® bridge and locking nut, and EVH tuners.Features:Body: Basswood Body Shape: Wolfgang® Body Finish: Gloss Polyurethane Number of Frets: 22 Position Inlays:Black Dot Fretboard Radius:12" to 16" Compound Radius (304.8 mm to 406.4 mm) Fretboard:Maple Neck Material: Bolt-On Quartersawn Maple Neck Finish: Hand-Rubbed Oil Nut Width:1.6875" (42.8 mm) Scale Length: 25.5" (64.8 cm) Bridge Pickup: EVH® Wolfgang Humbucking Neck Pickup: EVH® Wolfgang Humbucking Controls: Master Volume, Master Tone Hardware:Black Bridge: EVH®-Branded Floyd Rose® Locking Tremolo with EVH D-Tuna® String Nut:Floyd Rose® Locking Strings: D'Addario (.010-.046 Gauges)
Title: EVH Wolfgang Special 6-string Electric Guitar! Tobacco Sunburst! Arch Top! L@@K
